metadata.description: Curated collection of Claude Code plugins for modern full-stack development with LLM performance tracking and E2E skill testing

plugins.name: code-analysis
plugins.description: Deep code investigation with claudemem. v3.2.3: Marketplace rename to magus. v3.0.0: ENRICHMENT MODE.

plugins.name: multimodel
plugins.description: Multi-model collaboration, orchestration, and workflow patterns. v2.4.2: Marketplace rename to magus. 15 E2E tests.

plugins.name: agentdev
plugins.description: Create, implement, and review Claude Code agents and commands with multi-model validation, LLM performance tracking, and session-based artifact isolation. v1.5.3: Marketplace rename to magus.

plugins.name: seo
plugins.description: Highly autonomous SEO toolkit (~80% autonomy) with AUTO GATEs, self-correction loops, and multi-model validation. v1.6.3: Marketplace rename to magus. Features E-E-A-T self-assessment, keyword research, content optimization, technical audits.

plugins.name: video-editing
plugins.description: Professional video editing toolkit with FFmpeg operations, Whisper transcription, and Apple Final Cut Pro project generation. v1.1.1: Marketplace rename to magus. Features intelligent video analysis, automated transcription with timing sync, FCPXML timeline creation.

plugins.name: nanobanana
plugins.description: AI image generation and editing using Google Gemini 3 Pro Image API. v2.3.1: Marketplace rename to magus. Simple Node.js CLI with markdown styles and batch generation.

plugins.name: conductor
plugins.description: Context-Driven Development workflow inspired by Gemini Conductor. v2.1.1: Marketplace rename to magus. Full-featured implementation with TDD workflow, Phase Completion Protocol, Git Notes audit trail, and comprehensive styleguides.

plugins.name: dev
plugins.description: Universal development assistant with real skill discovery. v1.33.0: Workflow coaching system with Stop/SessionStart hooks. 8 rule-based detections, cross-session persistence. 47 skills.

plugins.name: statusline
plugins.description: Colorful statusline with worktree awareness, plan limits with reset countdowns, token counts, compaction detection, and customizable themes. v1.4.1: UTC timezone fix, days/hours duration formatting.

plugins.name: terminal
plugins.description: Interactive terminal integration for Claude Code. v1.0.0: First release with ht-mcp and tmux-mcp support, 9 E2E tests across 3 models. Enables Claude to interact with TUI applications, run commands, and observe real terminal output.

plugins.name: bun
plugins.description: Production-ready TypeScript backend development with Bun runtime. v1.6.2: Marketplace rename to magus. Features Biome, Prisma, Hono, Docker, Apidog MCP integration, testing workflows, and AWS ECS deployment.

plugins.name: frontend
plugins.description: Comprehensive frontend development toolkit with React 19, Vite, TanStack Router & Query v5, shadcn/ui. v3.15.2: Marketplace rename to magus. Features multi-model code review, Chrome DevTools MCP, 13 skills, 11 agents.

plugins.name: instantly
plugins.description: Cold email outreach toolkit with Instantly.ai MCP integration. v1.0.3: Marketplace rename to magus. Features campaign analytics, sequence building, A/B testing, lead management.

plugins.name: autopilot
plugins.description: Autonomous task execution with Linear integration. v0.2.1: Marketplace rename to magus. Picks tasks from Linear, routes to agents via tag-to-command mapping, generates proof-of-work artifacts.
